testcase.name: User logs in successfully
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user logs in with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed Then the user should be redirected to the products page.....................passed

testcase.name: User adds a product to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged in.................................................passed When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart........................passed And the user navigates to the cart..........................................passed Then "Sauce Labs Backpack" should be present in the cart....................passed

testcase.name: User removes an item from the cart
testcase.system-out: Given the user has "Sauce Labs Backpack" in the cart........................passed When the user removes "Sauce Labs Backpack" from the cart...................passed Then "Sauce Labs Backpack" should not be present in the cart................passed

testcase.name: User continues shopping from the cart
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the cart page..........................................passed When the user clicks on Continue Shopping...................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the products page.....................passed

testcase.name: User proceeds to checkout
testcase.system-out: Given the user has "Sauce Labs Backpack" in the cart........................passed When the user proceeds to checkout..........................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the checkout page.....................passed

testcase.name: Valid login
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"...........passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should be redirected to the inventory page...........................passed

testcase.name: Empty username
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter username "" and password "secret_sauce"........................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see the error message "Epic sadface: Username is required"....passed

testcase.name: Invalid username
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter username "invalid-username" and password "secret_sauce"........passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see the error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service".passed

testcase.name: Empty password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter username "standard_user" and password "".......................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see the error message "Epic sadface: Password is required"....passed

testcase.name: Invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter username "standard_user" and password "wrong_password".........passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see the error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service".passed

testcase.name: Empty username and password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter username "" and password ""....................................passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see the error message "Epic sadface: Username is required"....passed

testcase.name: Locked out user
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter username "locked_out_user" and password "secret_sauce".........passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should see the error message "Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out.".passed

testcase.name: Problem user login
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter username "problem_user" and password "secret_sauce"............passed And I click the login button................................................passed Then I should be redirected to the inventory page...........................passed

testcase.name: TC009 Verify product listing page after login
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a valid user........................................passed Then the product listing should display names and prices....................passed

testcase.name: TC010 Verify product names and prices are displayed
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a valid user........................................passed Then the product listing should display names and prices....................passed

testcase.name: TC011 Verify sorting options - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a valid user........................................passed When I sort products by "Name (A to Z)".....................................passed Then products should be sorted by "Name (A to Z)"...........................passed

testcase.name: TC011 Verify sorting options - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a valid user........................................passed When I sort products by "Name (Z to A)".....................................passed Then products should be sorted by "Name (Z to A)"...........................passed

testcase.name: TC011 Verify sorting options - Example #1.3
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a valid user........................................passed When I sort products by "Price (low to high)"...............................passed Then products should be sorted by "Price (low to high)".....................passed

testcase.name: TC011 Verify sorting options - Example #1.4
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a valid user........................................passed When I sort products by "Price (high to low)"...............................passed Then products should be sorted by "Price (high to low)".....................passed

testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a valid user........................................passed When I add "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart................................passed Then "Sauce Labs Backpack" should be in the cart............................passed
